title: Ticket #2239: remove unused numMatched variable -- aka "negotiate() code cleanup"
description:
numMatched is an unused variable passed by reference to negotiate. It's incremented/decremented, but never used for anything.

There are a few other code cleanup targets in and around negotiateWithGroups(). I'll compile a list here. Feel free to add your own!

  • "scheddAd" --> "submitterAd", "scheddName" --> "submitterName", etc.
  • de-spaghettify some of the nested-iffing around call to negotiate()
  • /usr/local/src/condor/grid/src/condor_negotiator.V6/matchmaker.cpp:3443: warning: unused parameter ‘share’
  • get rid of "char* / const char*" warnings and the "floating point == / !=" warnings. There are so many of these that I literally missed a "real" warning on at least one occasion.
